title: We are working on Human Behavioural studies, especially Dota 2 rage induced. Please help us out!
content: My partner and I are working on a Human Behaviour project. Specifically, it deals with rash, intuitive decisions made based on emotions. We want to see how rage in Dota 2 can come into everyday effect. Of course if you are a consistent winner, we'd love to see how that plays out into real life as well. By seeing the before-a-game/post-game differences, we want to see if success or failure in a video game can affect how people act in real life. We hope that through this, dota players can perhaps...

title: Am I the only one who finds HotS to be the only MOBA they like watching?
content: HotS is the only MOBA I've ever liked watching, and I think I can divide my reasons for vastly preferring it to LoL and DOTA 2 into three categories: Visuals, pacing, and mechanics. Visually, I find LoL to be repugnant with its overly-cartoony art style, while DOTA 2 is at the other end of the spectrum, with dull, dim visuals. HotS, in this regard, seems to strike a balance between the two. The issue of pacing is an obvious one. LoL and DOTA 2 matches tend to drag on for quite a long time, whi...
